Atlanta.Williams Street: Williams Street Productions, LLC, (simply known as Williams Street, and formerly known as Ghost Planet Industries, named after Space Ghost's home planet), is an animation studio that is owned by Cartoon Network, a subsidiary of the Turner Broadcasting System division of Time Warner. The studio is the in-house production arm of Adult Swim, as well as the network's main headquarters. Keith Crofford and Mike Lazzo oversee operations for the studio building.
